coredata.dc:title: Relatives2 emission yield by intermediate strong coupling in 3,4-benzpyrene
coredata.dc:creator: Van Den Bogaardt, P.A.M.
Rettschnick, R.P.H.
Van Voorst, J.D.W.
coredata.dc:description:
Abstract
The statement that in case of intermediate strong coupling the relative S2 emission yield of large isolated molecules is proportional to the ratio of the density of states in the zero order S2 and S1 manifold has been confirmed for 3,4-benzpyrene.

head.ce:title: Relatives2 emission yield by intermediate strong coupling in 3,4-benzpyrene

ce:affiliation.ce:textfn: Laboratory for Physical Chemistry, University of Amsterdam, Amsterdam, The Netherlands

ce:abstract-sec.ce:simple-para: The statement that in case of intermediate strong coupling the relative S2 emission yield of large isolated molecules is proportional to the ratio of the density of states in the zero order S2 and S1 manifold has been confirmed for 3,4-benzpyrene.
